meanings.sent1: The river flowed unidirectionally towards the sea.
meanings.sent2: The conveyor belt moved unidirectionally from left to right.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hopped unidirectionally along the fence, never looking back.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced unidirectionally towards a solution, leaving all doubts behind.
meanings.sent5: The arrow shot unidirectionally through the air, hitting the target with precision.

meanings.definition: Moving or operating in one direction only
meanings.sent1: The unidirectionally rotating fan kept the room cool.
meanings.sent2: The highway had unidirectionally marked lanes for traffic flow.
meanings.sent3: The unidirectionally designed toy car could only move straight ahead.
meanings.sent4: His unidirectionally focused mind made him a determined athlete.
meanings.sent5: The unidirectionally moving escalator carried people effortlessly to the next floor.
